Featured item 

Use this section for the most important topic for the sector. If no priority, use it for framework update.

Find out which frameworks were extended, expired or awarded in [month] in our regular monthly update. You will also find a list of all our commercial agreements in our interactive digital brochure.

Aggregation opportunities

Upcoming aggregations include:

  • Mobile Voice and Data Services Aggregated Procurement - for service from January 2022 sign up by 13 September 2021
  • IT hardware leading

Visit our website to explore all our current opportunities and timescales.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Webinars and events

This month our webinars include [maximum 4 bullets to showcase best ones for sector, name, date and link only]:
  • energy price competitiveness, 18 June
  • financial recovery after Covid-19 (in conjunction with CIPFA), 24 June
You will also find us at these events [maximum 2 bullets to showcase best ones for sector/contra deals]:
  • HCSA summer conference, 17 June
  • Public Sector Show, 25 June

Visit our events page to explore our full calendar and sign up.

More news

 

Example 1

[aim to keep each item as short as possible]
As organisations across the UK begin to return to the workplace, there is now a direct need to make working environments COVID-secure.

Find out what products are available and how to buy.

Example 2

As organisations across the UK begin to return to the workplace, there is now a direct need to make working environments COVID-secure.

Find out what products are available and how to buy.
 

CCS in the news
  • Public Finance (registration needed): Charlene Maginnis explains how we are guiding suppliers to build social value 
  • National Health Executive: read how NICE transformed its use of space in preparation for Smarter Working in 
  • Public Sector Executive: Kim Harrison writes about how to transition your fleet to meet your carbon net zero targets

Get in touch

If you would like to talk to someone and don’t know who your local account manager is please contact your regional lead:

  • North (North West, Yorkshire and Humber and North East)
    lucy.flint@crowncommercial.gov.uk
  • Central (East Midlands, West Midlands and East Anglia) 
    matthew.freeman@crowncommercial.gov.uk
  • South (South East and South West) 
    andrea.fitzgerald@crowncommercial.gov.uk
  • London 
    nicola.rees@crowncommercial.gov.uk

You can also call our customer service team on 0345 410 2222, email info@crowncommercial.gov.uk
